name: ShuriBlitz
description:
ShuriBlitz is my entry for the first simmer jam that happened on May 3-5, 2019. The theme was “minimalism” with an emphasis on using just two colors or shades.

HOW TO PLAY
In the game you will control a shuriken that moves faster the farther it is from the desired position. Random points are gain when a monster dies, and a bonus combo points will be gain for killing consecutively. However, be careful not to hit any brick as this could spell "Game Over!"

CONTROLS
Left Click To Move
